summary.label:
The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).

The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.

Blood pressure monitor & heart rate tracker app - Our application does not measure blood pressure. The app allows you to track it. For measurement use, FDA-approved blood pressure monitors.

App Main Features:
 
- Modern and user-friendly interface
- High blood pressure control
- Clear graphs
- Measurement history
- Reminders and notifications

Blood Pressure Levels:

Normal: Systolic 90-119 and Diastolic 60-79
Hypotension: Systolic 90 and less or Diastolic 60 and less
Elevated: Systolic 120-129 and Diastolic 60-80
Hypertension - Stage 1: Systolic 130-139 or Diastolic 80-90
Hypertension - Stage 2: Systolic 140-180 or Diastolic 90-120
Hypertensive: Systolic 180 and higher or Diastolic 120 and higher

Aging Adults:

In adults, systolic blood pressure rises from early adulthood onward, up to at least age 70. Diastolic pressure tends to begin to rise at the same time but starts to fall earlier in mid-life, approximately age 55. Mean blood pressure rises from early adulthood, plateauing in mid-life, while pulse pressure rises quite markedly after the age of 40.

Consequently, in many older people, systolic blood pressure often exceeds the normal adult range. The rise in pulse pressure with age is attributed to increased stiffness of the arteries.

Stay healthy!

summary.label: "Moje zdravlje" je aplikacija za korisnike "MediGroup" zdravstvenog sistema. Nudi Vam brz uvid u Vaše nalaze, jednostavan način zakazivanja pregleda, sakupljanje bodova koje možete iskoristiti u našim domovima zdravlja kao i osnovne informacije o "MediGroup" ustanovama.

Mobilna aplikacija „Pomozimo zajedno“ omogućuje povezivanje osoba koje se nalaze u kriznim situacijama zbog iznenadnih i teških zdravstvenih poteškoća sa stručnim osobama koje pružaju savjetovanje i podršku u stvarnom vremenu, kakobi oboljeli i članovi njihovih obitelji dobili stručnu podršku i savjete za savladavanje prvotnog šoka i stresa te administrativnu i organizacijsku podršku pri dolasku na liječenje u Zagreb, daleko od svoga doma. Aplikacija omogućava pružanje digitalnih online usluga: savjetovanja, psihološke podrške, podnošenje zahtjeva za uslugu kod pružatelja usluge ili u domu korisnika, pomoć pri organizaciji života tijekom liječenja daleko od doma, u Zagrebu ili u inozemstvu. Aplikacija nudi savjetovanje i podršku putem poruke, telefonskim putem kao i mogućnost zadavanja zahtjeva za primanje usluge uživo u kapacitetima humanitarne udruge „fra Mladen Hrkać“ ili u vlastitom domu korisnika. Unutar same aplikacije se evidentiraju podaci o korisnicima te o tijeku njihova liječenja i oporavka, što će stručnim osobama omogućiti praćenje psihofizičkog stanja oboljele osobe i članova obitelji. Time se osigurava priprema kvalitetnog individualnog pristupa u pružanju podrške. Osim toga, jedna od funkcija aplikacijeje i prikupljanje povratnih informacija o kvaliteti usluge. Sami korisnici usluge mogu dati svoje prijedloge za poboljšanje usluga a samim tim i kvalitete usluga. Osjećaj sigurnosti je vrlo važan i ključan segment u najtežim trenutcima njihovih života – kada saznaju da oni sami ili netko od članova njihovih obitelji boluje od teške bolesti te da je oboljeli primoran liječiti se daleko od vlastitoga doma. Kroz aplikaciju je moguće dobiti sve informacije i interaktivno se upoznati sa svime štoih čeka na liječenju daleko od doma kao i sve vrste usluga koje im humanitarna udruga „fra Mladen Hrkać“ pri tom može pružiti. Zahvaljujući tehnologiji i aplikaciji dojam koji ostaje na korisnicima izaziva sigurnost i vjeru u pozitivan ishod. Pri tome, u stvarnom vremenu korisnici mogu uputiti kontakt i poruku stručnim suradnicima u Udruzi koji će riješiti sve njihove sumnje, nedoumice i pomoći im u organizaciji liječenja daleko od doma. Osim podrške u prvim trenutcima, interakcija kroz aplikaciju odvija se tijekom cijelog boravka na liječenju daleko od doma. Pored pružanja digitalnih socijalnih usluga pripadnicima ranjivih skupina, mobilna aplikacija unaprjeđuje informacijsko-komunikacijske odnose sa volonterima, ustanovama socijalne skrbi i ostalim institucijama, srodnim organizacijama civilnog društva, donatorima, medijima i širom javnosti. Svi oni doprinose izgradnji društva koje je osviješteno osocijalnim rizicima teško oboljelih osoba i osoba s invaliditetom i uz to se educiraju o načinima pružanja podrške takvim osobama s ciljem lakše integracije u zajednicu. Aplikacija omogućuje prijavu svih zainteresiranih osoba koje žele volontirati. U samo par koraka im omogućuje da postanu dio naše velike volonterske obitelji. Donatori osiguravaju sredstva za rad i pružanje socijalnih usluga. Bez podrške donatora ne bi bili u mogućnosti pružiti sve usluge i pomoći toliki broj osoba. Krozaplikaciju su dostupni podaci za doniranje i načine pomoći za donatore iz cijelog svijeta. Stručnu podršku putem mobilne aplikacije pružaju djelatnici i suradnici humanitarne udruge „fra Mladen Hrkać“, socijalni radnik, psiholog, psihijatar i pedagog. Digitalna online podrška od posebnog je značaja za osobe u ruralnim, potpomognutim i otočnim područjima kojima je pristup socijalnim uslugama i podršci, zbog nepovoljnog geografskog i gospodarskog položaja, ograničen.Izradu mobilne aplikacije „Pomozimo zajedno“ je sufinanciralo Ministarstvo za demografiju, obitelj, mlade i socijalnu politiku kroz projekt „Mobilna aplikacija za pomoć i podršku tijekom suočavanja sa bolesti“ u sklopu Natječaja za dodjelu jednokratnih financijskih podrški za 2019. godinu.

The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).

The application is based on the scientific research. It helps to determine the fertile days of the month, so you can either achieve or avoid pregnancy. The application uses the date of the last period and shows the date of the next period, the best days to conceive a baby, the ovulation day and when you can avoid pregnancy.

* Scientific Research *

The popular baby gender prediction method is used by default. But it’s based only on the widely-spread theory by Landrum Shettles. The application also supports the scientific baby gender prediction method. It’s based on the scientific research by Rodrigo Guerrero and the statistics of thousands of women.

You can change the gender prediction method on the “Settings” screen. But remember that either gender prediction method shows only slightly higher chances of conceiving a girl or a boy and it never guarantees the result.

* Full Version *

This is the full version of the application. You will be able to see the following data:

- The probability of getting pregnant on the current or on any selected day.
- The probability of conceiving a girl or a boy using the selected gender prediction method.
- Chances of getting pregnant during the current period.
- Chances of conceiving a girl or a boy during the current period.

* How to Use *

To generate the menstrual calendar you have to provide the following data:

- The first day of the last cycle (select the day and use the button “Add”).
- Average length of the menstrual cycle (adjust it on the “Settings” screen).
- Length of the luteal phase (most women can use the default value).

The application works best for women with regular menstrual cycle. But average cycle length is also a good way to predict when the ovulation should happen.

S povečanjem števila nesreč in nenadnih obolenj se povečujejo potrebe po nudenju prve pomoči. Zaradi različnih vzrokov ljudje prve pomoči v nesreči pogosto ne nudijo, kar ima za posledico večje zdravstvene zaplete pri poškodovanih ali obolelih osebah. Rezultati mnogih raziskav kažejo, da je problem povezan predvsem s pomanjkanjem znanja o pravilnem nudenju prve pomoči. Po drugi strani pa ustrezna prva pomoč dokazano zmanjšuje število in trajanje hospitalizacij, prispeva k učinkovitejšemu zdravljenju, boljšemu okrevanju, večji kakovosti življenja po poškodbi ali obolenju, ter tako dolgoročno pozitivno vpliva na zdravstveno blagajno, zmanjšuje okoljsko obremenjenost in povečuje splošno blaginjo prebivalstva.

Mobilna aplikacija Prva pomoč pokriva dva usklajena sklopa izobraževalno-informacijskih vsebin:
• Pomoč uporabnikom za učinkovito nudenje prve pomoči v primeru nastanka poškodb in najpogostejših nenadnih obolenj.
• Povečanje ravni znanja prve pomoči med splošno populacijo (pridobivanje doktrinarno ustreznih napotkov za nudenje prve pomoči, ocenjevanje znanja, obnavljanje/utrjevanje znanja, spodbujanje učenja prve pomoči, zmanjševanje predsodkov pred nudenjem prve pomoči, spodbujanje solidarnosti in zavedanja pomena pomoči sočloveku v stiski).

Strokovne vsebine aplikacije temeljijo na smernicah Evropskega referenčnega centra za prvo pomoč ter Strokovnega centra za prvo pomoč Rdečega križa Slovenije. Gre za besedilni, slikovni in video prikaz temeljnih vsebin in napotkov za prvo pomoč, namenjenih tako splošni javnosti kot tudi različnim skupinam in organizacijam (šolam, delovnim organizacijam, društvom, ekipam prve pomoči …).

V sklopu razvoja aplikacije smo strokovno vsebino razvili skupaj z Rdečim Križem Slovenije, Univerzitetnim kliničnim centrom (UKC) Ljubljana, Univerzo v Ljubljani - Zdravstveno fakulteto  in Univerzo v Mariboru - Fakulteto za organizacijske vede - Laboratorijem za ergonomijo.

Mein Laborergebnis

Getestete schnell, sicher und einfach über Laborergebnisse informieren.

In vielen Fällen warten Getestete dringend auf eine beruhigende Nachricht aus dem Labor. Hier wollen wir mit "Mein Laborergebnis" eine Lösung anbieten, die für die Getesteten und die beteiligten Labore unproblematisch funktioniert und allen Anforderungen an den Datenschutz genügt.

Um die Arbeitszeiten für die Übermittlung eiliger Laborergebnisse so gering wie möglich zu halten, haben wir für medizinische Labore die Möglichkeit geschaffen, Getesteten das Ergebnis einer Laboruntersuchung in Echtzeit zu übermitteln.

Getestete erhalten bei der Testung einen QR-Code, welcher eine UUID enthält und direkt auf eine entsprechende Ergebnisseite auf www.mein-laborergebnis.de verweist. Dieser QR-Code wird den Getesteten bei der Probenentnahme mitgegeben. In manchen Fällen können wir auch mit QR-Codes aus vorhandenen Quellen arbeiten.

Im Anschluss können die Getesteten den QR-Code einfach mit dieser App scannen, um sich über den Verlauf ihrer Untersuchungen zu informieren, oder die UUID manuell auf www.mein-laborergebnis.de eingeben.

Die App erlaubt es, verschiedene Testergebnisse zu verwalten. Einmal gescannte QR-Codes werden in der App gespeichert und können so ohne Aufwand erneut abgefragt werden. Zur einfacheren Handhabung können die QR-Codes individuell benannt werden oder bereits bekannte Testergebnisse wieder aus der Liste entfernt werden.

Hinweise: Zum Scannen des QR-Codes und Abruf des Testergebnisses wird eine aktive Internetverbindung sowie Zugriff auf die Kamera Ihres Gerätes benötigt. Unser Dienst funktioniert nur mit QR-Codes von Partnerlaboren. Auf Ihrem Begleitschreiben sollte auf "Mein Laborergebnis" verwiesen werden.

This application is a quick and easy-to-use tool for assessment of acute pain in cats based on changes in facial expressions. This tool underwent rigorous scientific validation and it was shown to be valid and reliable for the evaluation of pain in cats with different medical and surgical conditions, using both image- or real-time evaluation. 

The Feline Grimace Scale App teaches users about this tool and facilitates real-time pain scoring in cats. It has several drawings and images to facilitate learning, including a practice session. This App can be used by any person. 

Ultimately, the Feline Grimace Scale App aims to improve feline pain management across the globe by increasing awareness, providing education, and facilitating the practical assessment of acute pain in cats.

My Baby Heart Sounds is a quick and easy way to use your iPhone to listen, record and share your baby's heart sounds.

Not too long ago, we were pregnant mothers too. While our partners enjoyed listening to our babies' sounds by placing their ears on the tummy, we wanted to capture and share these precious audio-memories ourselves. We tried voice memo apps and other sound-recording apps but felt that there was something more we could do to improve the quality of the sound in a simple setup. Fast forward a couple years and here we are!

Why should you try this app?
- Minimum time to setup. All you need is your iPhone. Simple instructions are provided within the app and we are here to support you all the way.
- High quality sound. Using advanced audio signal processing techniques, we deliver a high quality audio experience that allows you to distinguish your baby's heart sounds. For best results use AirPods.
- Listen for free and only pay when you want to record and share.
- Secure. All recordings are stored on your phone. We do not have any access to your recordings. You decide how you would like to share your recordings.

Free version:
With the free version, listen to your baby's heart sounds unlimited number of times. When you are satisfied, you can purchase a premium version that allows you to record and share unlimited audio recordings of special moments and memories.

One time in-app purchase:
- Features included in Free version.

- Tag locations to remember and visualize where your chances are best for the next time you would like to hear your baby's heart sound.
- When you would like to share the recording, multiple options are provided that include email, text and other social media apps. 
- Store the recording outside the app on your device or external storage apps.

For best results:
- Use the app when you are 20-30 weeks or greater pregnant.
- Use the app in a quiet room

- Put the phone in Airplane Mode
- Start the app and place the iPhone on your tummy to listen for a clear sound. You may need to try a few different spots. Press "Record" to create a recording
- Use AirPods
